name: ArtiVision On-the-Go
shortDesc: Assistive vision device integrating text-to-speech, facial & emotional recognition.
tech: Python, OpenCV, Raspberry Pi, TTS API
details: A wearable assistive device for the visually impaired. Reads text aloud, identifies people and emotions, and responds to voice commands.

name: Robotic Arm with Object Recognition
shortDesc: A robotic arm that picks and recognizes objects using computer vision.
tech: Python, TensorFlow, Raspberry Pi, Servo Control
details: Created a prototype robotic arm integrated with a camera that detects and picks up objects based on color and shape recognition.
